fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Entertain**: Choose a target, they will gain 2 random Upgraded cards they can play like you do. (2 uses)
- **Bravo**: For the current round, two of the cards in your hand will become upgraded by random. (2 uses)
- **Final Performance**: For the next 2 nights, you will draw 4 cards per round. Afterwards, you will never be able to draw again. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **Bread and Circus**: When you have played 8 cards, you will draw an extra 2 cards at the end of the night. When you have played 20, draw 4, and so on.
- You follow all the rules on KA's factional post.
